column4: !pm | alverich, other people here will certainly know things i don't
dude, I already got it libgtk2.0-dev is already the newest version. but still getting this error You have to install the Gtk+ development (and runtime?) libraries version 2.4.x or superior.
link to the tarball you're trying to compile please
yeah sure :-) Thanks for your time dude
no it's just the GTK interface of f-prot
i think that needs gtk 1.2 -- try installing libgtk1.2-dev
well, actually it gives one less error
Ok, do you recommend any other antivirus for linux with GUI ?
well, you mean antivirus for linux *that check for Windows viruses*, i suppose?
I download many files here and I actually have broken my friends PCs by burning DVDs and giving it to them hehe so pathatic windows users
clamav has interfaces for GTK and KDE shipped in the repos... but i don't think it's nearly as good as f-prot as a scanner
I've also tried my luck with clamav but got this The following packages have unmet dependencies.
